参考AMM TASK 12-11-00-680-801对主油箱、通气油箱、中央翼油箱的沉淀槽放沉淀。
注:
待燃油充分沉淀后执行此工作。
Reference AMM TASK 12-11-00-680-801 to drain main tank, surge tank and center fuel tank sumps.
NOTE:
Do this work after the fuel sump fully.

pos.titlecn: 对1号油箱和2号油箱放沉淀工作
pos.titleen: Sumping Operation for the No. 1 Tank and the No. 2 Tank

para.text: 排放每个集水槽，直到燃油流入耐燃油容器中无水为止。
Drain each sump until the fuel that flows into the fuel resistant container, has no water.
目视检查容器中的燃油。如果发现燃油中有红色色素或发现其他污染物,按AMM 手册排故。
Do a visual inspection of the fuel in the container.If you see red dye in the fuel or other contamination,dispose per AMM
FINDING 检查结果:

pos.titlecn: 对通气油箱放沉淀工作
pos.titleen: Sumping Operation for the Surge Tanks

para.text: 排放每个集水槽，直到所有的燃油或水流入耐燃油容器中。
Drain each sump until all the fuel or water flows into the fuel tank.
目视检查容器中的燃油。如果发现燃油中有红色色素或发现其他污染物,按AMM 手册排故。
Do a visual inspection of the fuel in the container.If you see red dye in the fuel or other contamination,dispose per AMM.
FINDING 检查结果:

pos.titlecn: 对中央油箱放沉淀工作
pos.titleen: Sumping Operation for the Center Fuel Tank

para.text: 排放每个集水槽，直到燃油流入耐燃油容器中无水为止。
Drain each sump until the fuel that flows into the fuel resistant container, has no water.
目视检查容器中的燃油。如果发现燃油中有红色色素或发现其他污染物,按AMM 手册排故。
Do a visual inspection of the fuel in the container.If you see red dye in the fuel or other contamination,dispose per AMM.
FINDING 检查结果:
将飞机恢复到初始状态。
Put the aircraft back to its initial configuration.
